entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a character in the story who is having trouble saying Voldemort's name.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is a dark wizard who is the main antagonist of the story.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a character in the story who is having a conversation with Hagrid about Voldemort.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a wizard who is mentioned as being one of the few people that Voldemort was afraid of.

relationships.description: Voldemort was afraid of Dumbledore, but Hagrid is describing how he was afraid of him.
